mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_pd_wealth
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
select LAST_INSERT_ID()

update t_pd_wealth
PD_WEALTH_ID = #{record.pdWealthId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PRODUCT_ID = #{record.productId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
WEALTH_CATEGORY = #{record.wealthCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FOUND_DATE = #{record.foundDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FINANCING_SCALE = #{record.financingScale,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GRADE = #{record.grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLOSE_DPERIOD = #{record.closeDperiod,jdbcType=BIGINT},

RAISE_START_DATE = #{record.raiseStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RAISE_END_DATE = #{record.raiseEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FUND_SUSING = #{record.fundSusing,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RC_STATE = #{record.rcState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_DATE = #{record.modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OPER_COM_ID = #{record.operComId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_USER_ID = #{record.createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MODIFY_USER_ID = #{record.modifyUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CLOSE_DPERIODS = #{record.closeDperiods,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BENEFICIAL_TYPES = #{record.beneficialTypes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

START_INVEST_MONEY = #{record.startInvestMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INVEST_LIMIT_MONEY = #{record.investLimitMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INVEST_INCREASE_MONEY = #{record.investIncreaseMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLOSE_ACCOUNT_DATE = #{record.closeAccountDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REDEMPTION_END_DAYS = #{record.redemptionEndDays,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INCOME_WAY = #{record.incomeWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HISTORY_EARNRATE = #{record.historyEarnrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HISTORY_EARNRATE_PERIOD = #{record.historyEarnratePeriod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLOSE_DPERIOD_TYPE = #{record.closeDperiodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLOSE_DPERIOD_FEE = #{record.closeDperiodFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NET_VALUE_DISCLOSURE = #{record.netValueDisclosure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPECT_OPEN_DAY_RULES = #{record.expectOpenDayRules,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

INVEST_SCOPE = #{record.investScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVEST_DIRECTION = #{record.investDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVEST_STRATEGY = #{record.investStrategy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

RISK_CONTROL_MEASURE = #{record.riskControlMeasure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COOPERATION_PARTNER = #{record.cooperationPartner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RAISE_ACCOUNT = #{record.raiseAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRUSTEESHIP_ACCOUNT = #{record.trusteeshipAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
